name: CandorIQ
headline: Headcount & Compensation Management
description:
CandorIQ is software to manage Headcount and Compensation planning. Employees are +70% of all OPEX and yet still managed in sheets & email. We manage all people spend in 1 platform, integrated into your Finance & HR stack.

Product capabilities include:
- Headcount & backfill planning
- Headcount budget scenarios across departments
- Merit cycle planning
- Analytics including employee churn, hiring win/loss, cash burn

founders.name: Haris Ikram, Founder
founders.description:
Founder & CEO at CandorIQ. Former Head of Product at Checkr (YC) & Salesforce.
MBA at University of Chicago, BSc of Computer Engineering at KFUPM.

founders.name: Sutthipong Thavisomboon, Founder
founders.description: Founder & CTO at CandorIQ. Former Chief Architect at Series B Startup & Principal Engineer at Salesforce Einstein (Lead AI). MS Computer Science at Stanford University.

## Give your people spend planning a promotion
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64b62a0299e3c4ba827b6342/64c1f7fb257a06c3e2391111_Glyph_%20undefined.png)
### Global Benchmarking Data
Use our comprehensive, real time data or bring your own 3rd party data.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64b62a0299e3c4ba827b6342/64c1f8178410f2f3def3f008_Glyph_%20undefined.png)
### Churn prediction & analytics
Proactive flagging of retention opportunities & churn risk.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64b62a0299e3c4ba827b6342/64c1f84dfb7255f4c7096318_Glyph_%20undefined.png)
### Merit Cycle
Run merit cycle in days not months with AI powered recommendations & real-time collaboration.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64b62a0299e3c4ba827b6342/64c1f87a39523790ed09f218_Glyph_%20undefined.png)
### Employee Total Rewards
Fully customizable, employee total rewards portal.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64b62a0299e3c4ba827b6342/64c1f86639523790ed09c855_Glyph_%20undefined.png)
### Headcount Planning
Trust the headcount data to make org decisions, including org design, promotions, budget allocation, and more.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64b62a0299e3c4ba827b6342/64c1f89ffb7255f4c709c1c1_Glyph_%20undefined.png)
### Headcount Approvals
Centralize headcount & backfill requests, tied to budget.
[Talk to Us](https://www.candoriq.com/</request-a-demo>)

Connect Your HRIS / ATS

## Increase the ROI on Your People Spend
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64b62a0299e3c4ba827b6342/64b62a0299e3c4ba827b6424_icon-1-layout-v1-startech-x-template.svg)
### Hire & Retain Top Talent
by creating a competitive total compensation philosophy that candidates & employees understand
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64b62a0299e3c4ba827b6342/64b62a0299e3c4ba827b6423_icon-2-layout-v1-startech-x-template.svg)
### Plan Headcount Within Budget
by forecasting your spend on people with accurate compensation analysis
[Talk to Us](https://www.candoriq.com/</request-a-demo>)
## Collaborative Headcount & Compensation Planning for Modern Teams
From setting department budgets to making competitive offers, CandorIQ is built to meet the needs of all teams
Department heads
Finance Leaders
Line Managers
Employees & Candidates
![Merit Cycle planner, with three depeartemtns being displayed for approvers. ](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64b62a0299e3c4ba827b6342/64cb28d78282eeb992125714_22.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64b62a0299e3c4ba827b6342/64b62a0299e3c4ba827b641f_dots-2-hero%20v1-startech-x-template.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64b62a0299e3c4ba827b6342/64b62a0299e3c4ba827b641f_dots-2-hero%20v1-startech-x-template.svg)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64b62a0299e3c4ba827b6342/64c1e9362f351a1d4c6c3f11_isometric-idea-for-business-success-1%2023.png)
## Turbocharge Your Teams with Automation
Automatically Generated Merit Letters and Candidate Offers
[Talk to Us](https://www.candoriq.com/</request-a-demo>)
## Learn more from our 
Happy Clients
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64b62a0299e3c4ba827b6342/64bcba68ce8513bb0468060e_882c42d6-1bcd-416a-9617-468ab38dc07a-1470276329627%201.png)
CandorIQ synthesizes disparate systems into one platform allowing easy collaborative compensation tuning of your workforce. Given the increase of pay transparency laws companies are dealing with complex challenges insuring pay adjustments are fair and consistent. CandorIQ allows HR to execute their compensation philosophy and keep the business focused on it's strategic goals.
![Image of Darin Enferadi](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64b62a0299e3c4ba827b6342/64c1eab8cfb66e535b36352b_Rectangle%20851.png)
Darin Enferadi
VP of Talent
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64b62a0299e3c4ba827b6342/64c1ef2f4f2a2f5ac60149d2_Rainlogo.png)
As a Chief People Officer, I have been wanting a collaborative and automated tool that helps with workforce design, headcount budget planning, compensation management all in one and CandorIQ has cracked this code. HR and Finance can finally collaborate much more effectively and dynamically with people managers to ensure that their orgs are effective, budgets are maintained, and most importantly, their people are engaged and motivated.
![Image of Arjen Mackaaij](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64b62a0299e3c4ba827b6342/64c1eac2a6836d6afdc55fe9_Rectangle%20850.png)
Arjen Mackaaij
CHRO
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64b62a0299e3c4ba827b6342/64bdae6e491c490b4169219c_be417baa-7c33-46f2-9edb-c5544ed79e54-1586498451295.png)
CandorIQ helps our team to make informed data-driven decisions that allows us to execute our compensation philosophy with confidence.
![Image of Stacey Rubin](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64b62a0299e3c4ba827b6342/64cc7bc5602be14b9b11cba9_StaceyRubin.png)
Stacey Rubin
VP of People

# **The People Spend Platform, the modern way to manage your****#1 spend**
A unified platform for headcount spend, approvals and compensation planning to win and retain top talent with operational excellence
Talk to Us⟨20⟩
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64b62a0299e3c4ba827b6342/64b62a0299e3c4ba827b6452_dots-3-hero-v2-startech-x-template.svg)

generated_description:
**CandorIQ: Simplifying Headcount and Compensation Management**

Founded in 2023 and part of Y Combinator Batch S23, CandorIQ is on a mission to transform how companies manage their most significant operational expense: their people. With over 70% of operational expenditures tied to employee costs, it’s surprising that many organizations still rely on spreadsheet chaos and email threads for headcount and compensation planning. Enter CandorIQ—a comprehensive platform that centralizes all people-related expenses, integrating seamlessly into your Finance and HR systems.

### Product Offerings

CandorIQ’s capabilities include:

- **Headcount & Backfill Planning**: Streamlining the hiring process and tracking staffing needs.
- **Budget Scenarios**: Creating various headcount budget scenarios to navigate across departments.
- **Merit Cycle Planning**: Facilitating merit increases and compensation cycles efficiently.
- **Analytics Tools**: Analyzing employee churn, hiring win/loss rates, and cash burn to gain actionable insights.

### The Platform In Action

Imagine having all your people spend managed in one cohesive platform, enabling leaders to make data-driven decisions that align with their organizational goals. With tools such as real-time analytics, collaboration features, and automation for tasks like merit letter generation and candidate offers, CandorIQ empowers HR and finance teams to work together more effectively. 

### Who’s Behind CandorIQ?

Despite its recent inception, CandorIQ boasts a lean and efficient team of four, including notable Group Partner Nicolas Dessaigne. The startup is based in an undisclosed location, yet its ambitions are clear: to redefine how businesses approach headcount and compensation management.

### Why Choose CandorIQ?

Let’s face it: dealing with compensation is increasingly complex, especially with new pay transparency laws emerging. CandorIQ simplifies this by offering a transparent, customizable portal for navigating employee total rewards, ensuring that adjustments are fair and consistent.

Find out more about their solutions and explore insights into managing people spend on [CandorIQ's website](https://www.candoriq.com).

### Conclusion

In a business landscape where attracting and retaining top talent is paramount, CandorIQ provides the tools and insight businesses need to manage their workforce effectively. Moving beyond outdated practices, it helps organizations invest wisely in their biggest asset: their people.
